Title: Establishes the sanitary retail food store grant program
Summary: Establishes the sanitary retail food store grant program to provide funding to retail food stores that fail inspections to correct deficiencies if such stores are unable to sustain the costs to immediately correct critical deficiencies, are located in food deserts, and would otherwise be unable to stay in operation due to their inability to meet and maintain sanitary standards.
LawCode: Add ยง501, amd ยง500, Ag & Mkts L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the agriculture and markets law, in relation to establishing the sanitary retail food store grant program
